At Qmee, our mission is to provide a fre: At Qmee, our mission is to provide a free, easy-to-use platform that enables a community of change-makers to get paid for their opinions! To do this, our team works together to push the boundaries of what a survey platform can be, whilst making sure our users are treated fairly and prioritising data protection.
Creating a community of change-makers is: Creating a community of change-makers is no small feat and it can't be done alone. We're a team of problem solvers and innovators, with skills ranging from software engineering and data science to design. We collaborate cross-functionally with the shared goal of creating an engaging and rewarding Qmee experience!
Diversity is the key within any communit: Diversity is the key within any community and we're proud to say that Qmee crosses borders both for our users and within our teams. The Qmee team comes from more than 30 countries, over half of our employees are women or people of color and women are represented at all levels of company leadership.
Enabling our users to have the best Qmee: Enabling our users to have the best Qmee experience is at the heart of what we do. We've always got our ear to the ground to find out how we can make a better, faster and more entertaining platform. Improving features and coming up with new ideas is key to life at Qmee!
Qmee is a digital rewards platform that: Qmee is a digital rewards platform that allows users to earn cash rewards for their purchases & opinions, and gives brands a technology solution that gets faster, more accurate answers.
Working at Qmee, we're learners first. W: Working at Qmee, we're learners first. We strive for daily progress and celebrate the small wins as a team! We collaborate with kindness and find continuous connection through our passion for exploring new things.
